Public Delegate Sub ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs)
public delegate void ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs ^ e);
type ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventHandler = delegate of obj * ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The source of the event, the .
An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何通过使用显示经过筛选的数据控制从中间层业务对象，检索数据，然后使用控件来显示结果。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data by using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object, and then using a control to display the results. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The second code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that is used by the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用显示经过筛选的数据控制从中间层业务对象，检索数据，然后使用控件来显示结果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data by using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object, and then using a control to display the results. 控件可以筛选数据，仅当用于检索数据的方法检索其作为或对象。The control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a or object. 出于此原因，属性标识的数据检索为业务对象方法或对象。For this reason, the property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a or object. 代码示例组成控件，控件，控件，和一个**提交**按钮。The code example consists of a control, a control, the control, and a **Submit** button. 默认情况下，使用一个 Northwind traders 员工的名称填充控件。By default, the control is populated with the name of one of the employees at Northwind Traders. 控件将显示有关中的名称标识的员工信息。The control displays information about the employee who is identified by the name in the . 若要检索的数据的另一个员工，在控件中，键入该员工的完整名称，然后单击**提交**按钮。To retrieve data for another employee, in the control, type the full name of the employee, and then click the **Submit** button. 属性指定一个表达式，用于筛选的数据由指定的方法来检索属性。The property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the method that is specified by the property. 它使用到中包含的参数进行求值的参数占位符集合。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符被括在单引号 （'） 因为参数类型是字符串类型，可能会包含空格。In this example, the parameter placeholder is enclosed by single quotation marks (') because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果参数的类型为数值或日期，则不需要引号。If the type of the parameter is numeric or date, quotation marks are not required. 集合中包含一个参数绑定到的对象控件。The collection contains one parameter, a object that is bound to the control. 如果在未不指定任何名称控件，一个新参数添加到集合，以便搜索是否成功。If no name is specified in the control, a new parameter is added to the collection so that the search is successful. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 代码示例包含两个基本类：`EmployeeLogic`和`NorthwindEmployee`。The code example consists of two basic classes: `EmployeeLogic` and `NorthwindEmployee`. `EmployeeLogic`类封装业务逻辑和`NorthwindEmployee`类是一个包含仅加载和保存的数据层的数据所需的基本功能的模型类。The `EmployeeLogic` class encapsulates business logic and the `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 为简单起见，`EmployeeLogic`类创建一组静态的数据，而不是从数据层中检索数据。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用提供的 Web 窗体代码示例使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the Web Forms code examples that are provided. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/northwindemployee9.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/northwindemployee9.vb#2)]
